Well technically there is no incentive for single sided staking
The way it works for gMetis incentives are:
1) you hold gMetis and interact on socials (for now here later on X) and you get more reward in gMetis in return
2) provide liquidity on Hercules dex for Metis -gMetis pair than stake your liquidity in an spNFT and put it to nitro pool (sounds complicated but really you do it all at once when providing liquidity on Hercules dex)
